definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Pressure-induced molten globule states of proteins.
sentences.chinese: 压力下，蛋白质熔化的球体状态。

sentences.english: These readings were taken with 100 Ton of molten metal in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据来自100吨熔化炉内熔化的金属。

sentences.english: These readings were taken with 100 Ton of molten metal in the furnace.
sentences.chinese: 这些数据来自100吨熔化炉内熔化的金属。

sentences.english: The production intensity of the smelting furnace with a coke packed bed is very high.
sentences.chinese: 带有焦炭充填床的粉尘熔化炉，具有很高的冶炼强度。

sentences.english: The Calcium Oxide is used to mix oxygen with the molten steel.
sentences.chinese: 这些生石灰是用来将氧混合在熔化的钢水中。

sentences.english: Formed by solidification from a molten state. Used of rocks.
sentences.chinese: 火成的由熔化的岩石凝固形成的。

sentences.english: Planets are thought to owe their magnetic fields to an iron core that is at least partly molten.
sentences.chinese: 人们认为行星的磁场是由半熔化状态的铁核产生的。

sentences.english: The corpuscle agent hardly sees the alarm belt cook.
sentences.chinese: 小单间的卖次很多见到铃铛带子熔化。

sentences.english: As the aluminum began to melt, it pooled off and ran off onto the roadway surface.
sentences.chinese: 铝开始熔化成液体，然后汇集成流，在路面上流淌。

sentences.english: It’s hot enough to melt hell. I hope it will be cooler soon.
sentences.chinese: 现在热得足以把地狱熔化了，希望很快能够凉快一点。

sentences.english: The melting temperatures and heats of fusion decrease approximately linearly with the reciprocals of cluster radii.
sentences.chinese: 团簇的熔点和熔化焓与团簇半径的倒数呈线性关系。

sentences.english: Metal scrap can be melted down and reused.
sentences.chinese: 废旧金属可以熔化后再使用。

sentences.english: Melting property of alloys was studied by DSC.
sentences.chinese: 采用差示扫描量热仪研究了合金的熔化特性。

sentences.english: The concept of heat threshold is brought forward for the melting process of radioactive source with constant heat rate.
sentences.chinese: 针对恒释热率热源接触熔化，提出了热量阈值的概念。

sentences.english: At a certain temperature, the melt in the bush will seize or run.
sentences.chinese: 在一定的温度下，轴套的金属会粘滞或熔化。

sentences.english: The coatings were composed of dense well melted particles and micro-cracks.
sentences.chinese: 涂层由致密的熔化较好的颗粒和微裂纹组成。

definition: to melt/to thaw/to dissolve/to blend into/to combine/to fuse
